tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Our doctor introduced Dr.Shashikala Madam and she will be always very kind and taking care of patient health.
She is very friendly and will give detailed explanation about whatâ€™s going in the treatment.
In my experience if we go the clinic and met Dr.Sashikala will get positive vibes, no matter you are upset. 
If any doubt we can contact any time and she will be respond immediately.
She will be very much experienced and much cooperative during the treatment.
We are very happy and am now 4month pregnant.
I highly recommend this clinic for all gynec related issues and IVF,IUI, Infertility-IVF and Laparoscopy treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Shashikala is expectionally good and uses advanced medical sciences for her treatment. From getting pregnant till delivery she is constantly in touch and so concerned about her patients, with her team she does wonders. She also takes second opinion from her fellow colleagues in case of High risk pregnancy and ensures ðŸ’¯ results.
Highly recommend for her treatment and patience. She is approachable anytime and she clarifies all our concerns. When I asked her can my baby be delivered as per my wish on same date and time with out second thought she agreed to it and She made it happen I am so happy for that.
She made us feel comfortable . Her patience in listening to our problem is worth appreciation. She made us sure we are in right hands.

review: Friendly and doesn't add to your stress... Does what is needed and super warm and comforting. So I'm happy for the treatment given
Very friendly **** ******* ********** Feels more like talking to a known person. Good communication skills.
